abstract: After an initial outcry, many opponents of Anheuser-Busch‘s sale to Inbev, including lawmakers and members of Anheuser’s founding family, eventually gave the deal their support. But one critic of the $52 billion transaction isn’t backing down.
lead_paragraph: After an initial outcry, many opponents of Anheuser-Busch‘s sale to Inbev, including lawmakers and members of Anheuser’s founding family, eventually gave the deal their support. But one critic of the $52 billion transaction isn’t backing down.

headline.main: Cross-Border Beer Brawl Heads to Arbitration
